modName: Elena Wind-Chaser (Fully voice acted follower mod)
summary: Voice acted, quest aware, 2000+ lines of dialogue.
descriptionHtml:
Introducing Elena! She's a nord follower that can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. She is fully voiced by the brilliant voice actress NAMEHERE with 2000+ lines of dialogue and (almost) completely quest aware. I highly recommend picking her up at the start of a new playthrough so you can get the full experience. She was designed to be the perfect friend/companion for the Dragonborn, because Skyrim is as lonely as it is cold sometimes.

[center]BACKSTORY/STATS/PERSONALITY

NAME: Elena Wind-Chaser
RACE: Nord.
WEAPON OF CHOICE: One handed swords, or daggers.

QUICK BIOGRAPHY SYNOPSIS: (Most of the fun is getting to know it from her perspective!)[/center]

Version 1.0 Includes:

[list]
[*]Main Quest Awareness
[*]Her Own Quest
[*]All vanilla factions (The Companions, Thieves Guild, Dark Brotherhood, College of Winterhold, Imperial army, Stormcloak army)
[*]Dialogue for 50+ various side quests!
[*]Chatter + Banter
[*]Optional Romance Questline + married life dialogue (Open to female characters as well as male!)
[*]Hearthfire support
[/list]
Coming soon:
[list]
[*]Dragonborn + Dawnguard awareness
[*]Dialogue for every single side quest in the vanilla game
[*]Her own horse (for now the Convenient Horses mod should work if you need her to have one)
[/list]
[size=5]REQUIRED[/size]
[size=3]Skyrim.esm + update.esm
the latest version of skse
[/size]
[size=5]RECOMMENDED
[/size][size=3]Convenient Horses[/size]

[size=4][b]**Warning/disclaimer** I[/b] have not tested her out with any follower overhaul mods because I don't use them, so I'm not sure if they are compatible with Elena or not. To air on the side of caution, I recommended that you do NOT try to use any commands on her that aren't a part of this mod.[/size]
SPECIAL THANKS TO -
khaleesiing for all the writing/scripting
VOICE ACTRESS for lending their amazing talent and voice
TESTER for testing/troubleshooting
TESTER for testing/troubleshooting
TESTER for testing/troubleshooting
Emma, Smartbluecat, and potasticpanda for making amazing follower mods that gave me the inspiration to create my own!

CREDIT -

Logram for The Eyes of Beauty
HN66s Long Eye Lashes

HelloSanta for SG Female Textures
Zonzai and Seren4xx for Real Girls Realistic Body Texture
drunkenmojo for Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for CBBE

author: khaleesiing
